random_neg_sample[source]

random_neg_sample(item_set, item_size)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Tests

{% raw %} 
item_set = [1,2,3,4,5]
item_size = 10
random.seed(32)
neg_item = random_neg_sample(item_set, item_size)

test_eq(neg_item, 8)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
item_set = [1,2,3,4,5,5]
item_size = 10
random.seed(45)
neg_item = random_neg_sample(item_set, item_size)

test_eq(neg_item, 7)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
item_set = [1,2,3,4,5]
item_size = -1
random.seed(45)

test_fail(lambda: random_neg_sample(item_set, item_size), contains="empty range for randrange() (1,-1, -2)")
{% endraw %}
